summary: This mod adds 3 bosses,see the long description for more information.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 3 bosses 

Boss #1 Gingar The Great 
Location:Dragonsreach 

Boss #2 Dwarven Man 
Location:Riverwood 

Boss #3 The Grongar Twins 
Location:across the river from riverwood nearby the log 

Also adds 2 weapons that can be found on the corpses of the bosses

Note:The weapons you get from these bosses are not to be used against other bosses,if one would use a boss weapon against a boss the mod just basically makes itself crap,the weapons can only be used in combat against 3rd party and vanilla creatures,stored in a chest in your home,or hung on your wall. 

Weapon #1 Gingar the great's warhammer
Weapon #2 The menacing morning star
Weapon #3 & 4 Harry and Mary's daggers
author: Gunchap Red Follower of Celestia
